Extensions/String.html#/s:FE7EmarcamSS5i.name: index(_:)
Extensions/String.html#/s:FE7EmarcamSS5i.abstract: Converts a plain ol’ integer index into a String.IndexType.

Extensions/String.html#/s:FE7EmarcamSS6i.name: insert(_:at:)
Extensions/String.html#/s:FE7EmarcamSS6i.abstract: Inserts a new element at a given index in this string.

Extensions/String.html#/s:FE7EmarcamSS6i.name: insert(contentsOf:at:)
Extensions/String.html#/s:FE7EmarcamSS6i.abstract: Inserts the contents of sequence at a given index in this string.

Extensions/String.html#/s:FE7EmarcamSS15.name: replaceSubrange(_:with:)
Extensions/String.html#/s:FE7EmarcamSS15.abstract: Replaces a range of characters in this string with a given sequence.

Extensions/String.html#/s:FE7EmarcamSS15.name: replaceSubrange(_:with:)
Extensions/String.html#/s:FE7EmarcamSS15.abstract: Replaces a closed range of characters in this string with a given sequence.

Extensions/String.html#/s:FE7EmarcamSS6r.name: remove(at:)
Extensions/String.html#/s:FE7EmarcamSS6r.abstract: Removes a character at a given index and returns the character

Extensions/String.html#/s:FE7EmarcamSS14.name: removeSubrange(_:)
Extensions/String.html#/s:FE7EmarcamSS14.abstract: Removes a closed range of characters from this string

Extensions/String.html#/s:FE7EmarcamSS14.name: removeSubrange(_:)
Extensions/String.html#/s:FE7EmarcamSS14.abstract: Removes a range of characters from this string

Extensions/String.html#/s:vE7EmarcamSS5c.name: count
Extensions/String.html#/s:vE7EmarcamSS5c.abstract: The number of characters in this string.

Extensions/String.html#/s:FE7EmarcamSS11.name: removeFirst()
Extensions/String.html#/s:FE7EmarcamSS11.abstract: Removes and returns the first character of this string.

Extensions/String.html#/s:FE7EmarcamSS11.name: removeFirst(_:)
Extensions/String.html#/s:FE7EmarcamSS11.abstract: Removes a number of characters from the beginning of this string.

Extensions/String.html#/s:FE7EmarcamSS10.name: removeLast(_:)
Extensions/String.html#/s:FE7EmarcamSS10.abstract: Removes a number of characters from the end of this string.

Extensions/String.html#/s:FE7EmarcamSS10.name: removeLast()
Extensions/String.html#/s:FE7EmarcamSS10.abstract: Removes the last character from this string.

Extensions/String.html#/s:FE7EmarcamSS9d.name: dropFirst()
Extensions/String.html#/s:FE7EmarcamSS9d.abstract: Returns the string obtained by removing the first character of this string

Extensions/String.html#/s:FE7EmarcamSS9d.name: dropFirst(_:)
Extensions/String.html#/s:FE7EmarcamSS9d.abstract: Returns the string obtained by removing the first n characters of this string.

Extensions/String.html#/s:FE7EmarcamSS8d.name: dropLast()
Extensions/String.html#/s:FE7EmarcamSS8d.abstract: Returns the string obtained by removing the last character of this string

Extensions/String.html#/s:FE7EmarcamSS8d.name: dropLast(_:)
Extensions/String.html#/s:FE7EmarcamSS8d.abstract: Returns the string obtained by removing the last n characters of this string.
